ygData.subject: Re: Solo'ing at Higher Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Well as far as spell selection I would say definitely Cast Force and Enstill.  Those are the 2 main one I use for my soloing.  I have heard alot of people say
ygData.messageBody:
Well as far as spell selection I would say definitely Cast Force and
Enstill. Those are the 2 main one I use for my soloing. I have heard alot
of people say that Cast Force is worthless since the patch, but I only get
resisted in it about 1 out of 5 times. To me those are excellent odds for a
spell. Sure sometimes I have to run, but more times then not I get the
kill. If they resist Cast Force I have found that Flame Shock (110 dmg)
does the trick. I have set my spells list up witht he following spells down
the line:

Shieldskin / or Shielding when I lose it
Gate
Shock of Flame (yes lvl 1 spell) (16 Dmg)
Enstill
Shock of Ice (38 Dmg)
Shock of Lighting (83 Dmg)
Flame Shock (110 Dmg)
Cast Force (173 Dmg)

Hoep this helps . And I might be posting my spot sooner than expected. Hit
22 last night <grin>

Shadair J'Axx
22 Wizard
Karana


----- Original Message -----
From: Sizkrath <jmoore@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 20, 1999 11:27 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Solo'ing at Higher Levels


> From: "Sizkrath" <jmoore@...>
>
> Am about to hit 20, any advice on spells selection and purchase order
would
> be much helpfull. You can sneak and tell me your solo spot and perhaps I
> can return the favor some time.. hehe. Btw I reached 19 prior to warr's,
> sk's, necro's, and shaman's which I hang with so no power shortage here..
:P
>
> Sizkrath Dark Elf Wiz.. Cazic Thule
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: John Penman <jpenman@...>
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 2:45 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Solo'ing at Higher Levels
>
>
> >From: "John Penman" <jpenman@...>
> >
> >Well I have finally hit 20th level yesterday and have found a beautiful
> spot
> >to solo in for levels 20-24. Once I hit 24th Ill let everyone know where
> it
> >is so let the anticipation build. My Soloing tactics are as many have
> >suggested here, Shoot and root....shoot and root. I would have to
disagree
> >though from what people have said that there is no major difference in
Root
> >and Enstill. I use Enstill now and Love it. I have gotten into
situations
> >when I blast the heck out of a mob and run out of mana, I then sit down
and
> >med for up to 2 bubs of mana then get back in battle and the mob is still
> >rooted or has just broken free. I love Enstill and think the extra mana
> it
> >uses is worth while.
> >
> >I expect to reach 24 by Sunday so maybe Monday Ill post where this spot
is
> >at.
> >
> >
> >Shadair J'Axx
> >20th Wizard
> >Karana
> >
> >----- Original Message -----
> >From: Valacian <abryson@...>
> >To: 'EQ Wizards' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>

> >Subject: [eq_wizards] Spells, This Forum,Etc.

> nice'
> >for Wizard spells really helps us be Wizards. I really believe that if
we
> >continue to complain or comment on the apparent lack of spells/problems
> with
> >spells that we have, we are not going to achieve what I believe this
> mailing
> >list was setup for. This list is to share information between all
Wizards
> >within Norrath ! We are going to lose potential and current subscribers
> (me
> >and I'm sure others), thus losing valuable shared infortmation because of
> >our ranting and raving about our class. Remember, Verant is probably not
> >reading this forum..
> >>
> >> My suggestion: Let's talk about ideas and share information that will
> >help each other play the class that we chose to play.
> >>
> >> So far, the most useful thing I have read (besides Spoiler information)
> is
> >the 'bug' that allows our Eye of Zoom to unlock doors. I think that's
> great
> >!!
> >>
> >> Valacian - 24th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
